definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: Send a phone card or care package to a soldier.
sentences.chinese: 給士兵們寄電話卡或是愛心包裹。

sentences.english: Calling cards are cards with numbers on them.
sentences.chinese: 電話卡是一些帶有號碼的卡。

sentences.english: Using the inexpensive phone card, a villager can call anyone in the country.
sentences.chinese: 村民能使用這種價廉電話卡給國內任何人打電話。

sentences.english: I'd like to buy an IP Card for national and international calls.
sentences.chinese: 我想買張可以打國內和國際長途的電話卡。

sentences.english: There must be a kiosk selling phone cards around here somewhere.
sentences.chinese: 附近一定有一間賣電話卡的售貨亭。

sentences.english: and you top up your phone and you know, whatever it is.
sentences.chinese: 給電話卡充值，無論什麼事。

sentences.english: The first Japanese card has a value fo about 28000 pounds.
sentences.chinese: 日本的第一張電話卡價值大約28000英鎊。

sentences.english: Two stage dialling, for calling cards.
Normal SIM card can not make international calls.
sentences.chinese: 普通的電話卡不能打國際長話。

sentences.english: I used to listen to rock music but now I collect telephone cards and paintings.
sentences.chinese: 我過去常聽搖滾樂，可現在我集電話卡和畫。

sentences.english: Could you please show me how to use this phone card?
sentences.chinese: 請問您能告訴我怎麼使用這個電話卡嗎？

sentences.english: I need to buy a calling card .
Yeah, I could make pictures with my phone cards by putting them together.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我可在我的電話卡上畫圖把它們放在一起。

sentences.english: Eine Telefonkarte zu 20 Euro oder zu 30 Euro?
sentences.chinese: 您要20歐元還是30歐元的電話卡？

sentences.english: The revenues were derived from online product sales of prepaid game and telephone cards.
sentences.chinese: 收入都是來自在線預付費遊戲卡及電話卡的銷售資金。

definition: online banking/abbr. for 網上銀行|网上银行[wang3 shang4 yin2 hang2]
Octopus card (Hong Kong smart card for electronic payments)
to go online/to connect to the Internet/(of a document etc) to be uploaded to the Internet/(tennis, volleyball etc) to move in close to the net
binding (loanword)/to bind (e.g. an account to a mobile phone number)
sales counter/front desk/bar/(of markets, medicines etc) OTC (over-the-counter)
(Tw) to put money into (a stored-value card or pre-paid phone account)/to top up
